src:
Vulić: Nikada nisam igrao protiv tako fizički moćnih igrača
“I pored toga biće drugačija utakmica nego u Londonu”, poručio je mladi vezista

05 Nov 2019

Fudbaler Crvene zvezde Miloš Vulić izneo je svoja očekivanja pred meč sa Totenhemom. Vezista crveno-belih ocenio je da očekuje potpuno drugačiju utakmicu u odnosu na onu u Londonu.“Suvišno je pričati o kvalitetu ekipe Totenhema. Mislim da smo u Londonu ušli dobro u utakmicu, igrali smo ofanzivno, imali veliki broj udaraca na gol. Međutim primili smo rano pogodak i morali da se otvorimo u ranom delu utakmice. To je veliki hendikep naročito protiv ekipe sa brzim igračima kakva je Totenhem. Sutra očekujem potpuno drugačiju utakmicu, pre svega zbog pune Marakane, imaćemo veliku podršku naših navijača. Njihovo prisustvo daće nam vetar u leđa da od prvog minuta izađemo maksimalno motivisano i da se borimo koliko možemo”, izjavio je Vulić.



Mladi vezista u karijeri nije imao mnogo prilika da igra protiv tako dobro fizički pripremljenih igrača.“Nisam imao puno prilike da igram sa tako dobro fizički pripremljenim igračima, koji igraju na vrhunskom nivou. Utakmica se igra pod pritiskom svih devedeset minuta, nema mnogo vremena za razmišljanje. Treba igrati sa što manje dodira. Sigurno da sam poučen iskustvom sa prve utakmice i ukoliko budem bio u sastavu, promeniću neke stvari u igri. Mislim da nema nikakve potrebe porediti utakmicu protiv Liverpula sa sutrašnjom protiv Totenhema, različiti su timovi, sezone takođe. Ono što je sigurno jeste da ćemo dati sve od sebe i rezultat će na kraju doći kao nagrada”, zaključio je Vulić.
text:
Vulic: I've never played against such physically powerful players
"Even so, it will be a different match than in London," said the young midfielder

05 Nov 2019

Red Star footballer Milos Vulic voiced his expectations ahead of the match with Tottenham. The red and white midfielder said he expected a completely different match from the one in London. "It is superfluous to talk about the quality of Tottenham's squad. I think we got into the game well in London, played offensively, had a lot of shots on goal. However, we received an early shot and had to open early in the game. That's a big handicap especially against a team with fast players like Tottenham. I expect a completely different game tomorrow, primarily because of the full Marakana, we will have a lot of support from our fans. Their presence will give us a breeze in the back to get as motivated from the first minute and fight as much as we can, ”Vulic said.



The young career midfielder did not have many opportunities to play against such well-prepared players. ”I did not have much opportunity to play with such well-prepared, top-level players. The game is played under pressure for all ninety minutes, there is not much time to think. It should be played with as little touch as possible. Surely I was taught by experience from the first game and if I was in the lineup I would change some things in the game. I don't think there is any need to compare the game against Liverpool with tomorrow against Tottenham, there are different teams, seasons too. What is certain is that we will do our best and the result will eventually come as a reward, ”concluded Vulic.
